__e: I have Amber back, and I'm having a wonderful time.
I mean, as long as Amber and the guys go for it.
Come on, Amber, can't we just be friends?
Amber is the Leader of 3rd Area of Casulo – Poço de Lava. But, she was replaced by Hammer by emperor´s order. Angry she asks to him and is send outside the Casulo.

Spring is coming, it's a season in which we would like carry out our plan. Amber is a romantic girl, she loves to show herself and take photos in any pose. Now please help her take her romantic wedding photoshoot and keep it for a souvenir.
